mapper.sql: ID, OMS_ID, CER_ID, BUSI_ID, NAME, RF_B0000, WORK_UNIT, ZJLX, ZJHM, CJ_WAY, HAPPEN_DATE, RETURN_DATE, REAL_RETURN_DATE, DATA_SOURCE, CJ_STATUS, CJ_RESULT, REMOVE_CJ_DESC, CREATOR, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, UPDATOR
mapper.insert: insert into cf_certificate_collection (ID, OMS_ID, CER_ID, BUSI_ID, NAME, RF_B0000, WORK_UNIT, ZJLX, ZJHM, CJ_WAY, HAPPEN_DATE, RETURN_DATE, REAL_RETURN_DATE, DATA_SOURCE, CJ_STATUS, CJ_RESULT, REMOVE_CJ_DESC, CREATOR, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, UPDATOR ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{omsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rfB0000,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zjlx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{zjhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{happenDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{returnDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{realReturnDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{dataSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{removeCjDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update cf_certificate_collection
OMS_ID = #{omsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CER_ID = #{cerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSI_ID = #{busiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RF_B0000 = #{rfB0000,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORK_UNIT = #{workUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZJLX = #{zjlx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ZJHM = #{zjhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CJ_WAY = #{cjWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HAPPEN_DATE = #{happenDate,jdbcType=DATE},
RETURN_DATE = #{returnDate,jdbcType=DATE},
REAL_RETURN_DATE = #{realReturnDate,jdbcType=DATE},
DATA_SOURCE = #{dataSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CJ_STATUS = #{cjStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CJ_RESULT = #{cjResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMOVE_CJ_DESC = #{removeCjDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATOR = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update cf_certificate_collection set OMS_ID = #{omsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CER_ID = #{cerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSI_ID = #{busiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RF_B0000 = #{rfB0000,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORK_UNIT = #{workUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZJLX = #{zjlx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ZJHM = #{zjhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CJ_WAY = #{cjWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HAPPEN_DATE = #{happenDate,jdbcType=DATE}, RETURN_DATE = #{returnDate,jdbcType=DATE}, REAL_RETURN_DATE = #{realReturnDate,jdbcType=DATE}, DATA_SOURCE = #{dataSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CJ_STATUS = #{cjStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CJ_RESULT = #{cjResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMOVE_CJ_DESC = #{removeCjDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATOR = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT rf_b0000 rfB0000, work_unit workUnit FROM cf_certificate_collection WHERE cj_status = '2' GROUP BY rf_b0000
SELECT user_id userId, user_name userName, user_mobile userMobile FROM cf_user WHERE org_id = #{rfB0000} AND user_state = '1'

SELECT a.id, a.name name, if(c.sex='1','男',if(c.sex='2','女',c.sex)) sex, c.birth_date csrq, c.rf_B0000 rfB0000, c.work_Unit workUnit, c.post, a.zjlx, (select item_name from sys_dict_item where dict_code='ZJLX' and item_code=a.zjlx) zjlxName, a.zjhm, a.data_source dataSource, (select item_name from sys_dict_item where dict_code='ZJCJSJLY' and item_code=a.data_source) dataSourceName, a.happen_Date happenDate, a.return_Date returnDate, a.cj_Result cjResult FROM cf_certificate_collection a INNER JOIN oms_reg_procpersoninfo c ON a.oms_id = c.id WHERE a.cj_status='2' AND a.rf_b0000=#{rfB0000}
SELECT id cerCjId, zjlx, zjhm FROM cf_certificate_collection WHERE RF_B0000 = #{rfB0000} AND CJ_STATUS = '2'
